Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.converters

[Groovy] Interface IncludeExcludeConverter

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.converters.Converter
      • All Superinterfaces:
        ConfigurableConverter, Converter

        A converter capable of including/excluding properties on the target object

        Graeme Rocher
